playerAction: Check your gear methodically before moving
outcomeSummary: Compass recovered; morale improves; move to orientation phase
narrativeSnippet: You inventory your kit in the flooded dark, recover your compass, and move off the drop point with a clear procedure.

playerAction: Use compass and terrain memory to orient
outcomeSummary: Positioning confidence increases; map-level orientation regained
narrativeSnippet: Using the compass and remembered terrain markers, you establish a workable bearing toward the assembly area.

outcomeSummary: Friendly contact made; one attached trooper joins
narrativeSnippet: The clicker exchange confirms friendly identification and a shaken paratrooper folds into your movement.

playerAction: Challenge from cover with clicker and confirm before approach
outcomeSummary: Henderson, Malone, and Doyle rally to command
narrativeSnippet: Recognition procedure works from cover; Henderson takes control of the regroup and your small element stabilizes.

playerAction: Set an L-shaped ambush with controlled crossfire
outcomeSummary: Patrol neutralized cleanly; intel recovered at ammo cost
narrativeSnippet: A disciplined ambush drops the patrol before they can maneuver; captured papers provide patrol-route intelligence.

playerAction: Door stack, positive ID, then room-clear
outcomeSummary: Rivera and Kowalski secured; medic and BAR capability restored
narrativeSnippet: The door challenge confirms friendlies before entry; Rivera and Kowalski join without fratricide.

playerAction: Send scouts forward before crossing the wired junction
outcomeSummary: Crossing completed with reconnaissance; rally point reached
narrativeSnippet: Forward scouts clear the crossing and the element enters the rally perimeter in control.
